name: Organizational-BlissBlog
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: organizational bliss blog
des: Organizational-Bliss is a wellness blog that guides others to live a simpler, happier, and more organized life in every facet. This includes, clearing physical clutter from spaces while beautifying them, managing to-dos, and letting go of people or habits that have become toxic. Shivani is the writer behind Organizational Bliss and her goal is to energize and empower her readers to attract more bliss into their mind, body, and souls everyday using simple techniques.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
